tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_traffic_log (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    port INT,
    protocol VARCHAR(50),
    data_size INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(50),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(50),
    traffic_data JSON,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    traffic_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    destination_ip VARCHAR,
    packet_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_log (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    data_size INT,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE suspicious_traffic_log (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    reason VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    ip_address VARCHAR(255),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE network_users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    ip_address VARCHAR(255),
    last_login TIMESTAMP,
    role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE network_anomalies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    anomaly_type VARCHAR(50),
    severity VARCHAR(50)
)
